page.title: Help Page
page.description:

You {count, plural, =0 {don't have any commands} one {have # command} other {have # commands}} available to execute.

embed.shortDescription: Sends an embed to the specified channel.

say.shortDescription: Sends a message to the specified channel

note.title: Note
note.description:
`<>` is required arguments
`[]` is optional arguments
`...` is means that you can specify multiple arguments
